learning_sources.name: Duolingo
learning_sources.description: Duolingo offers a free and interactive platform for learning German through games, quizzes, and exercises.

learning_sources.name: Memrise
learning_sources.description: Memrise provides a range of courses for learning German, emphasizing vocabulary and phrases.

learning_sources.name: Deutsche Welle
learning_sources.description: Deutsche Welle offers free online courses and resources for learning German, including video lessons and articles.

learning_sources.name: Goethe-Institut
learning_sources.description: The Goethe-Institut offers comprehensive courses and resources for learning German, both online and in-person.

learning_sources.name: BBC Languages - German
learning_sources.description: BBC Languages provides free resources, audio, and video lessons for learning German.

learning_sources.name: Langenscheidt
learning_sources.description: Langenscheidt offers a variety of German learning materials, including textbooks, dictionaries, and online courses.

learning_sources.name: Babbel
learning_sources.description: Babbel provides structured lessons with a focus on conversation and real-life scenarios for learning German.

learning_sources.name: Rosetta Stone
learning_sources.description: Rosetta Stone offers language learning software, including courses for learning German.

learning_sources.name: Memrise
learning_sources.description: Memrise provides a range of courses for learning English, emphasizing vocabulary and phrases.

learning_sources.name: BBC Learning English
learning_sources.description: BBC Learning English provides free audio, video, and text-based resources for learning English.

learning_sources.name: Cambridge English
learning_sources.description: Cambridge English offers a wide range of resources for learning English, including practice tests and study materials.

learning_sources.name: Oxford Online English
learning_sources.description: Oxford Online English offers video lessons and practice exercises for improving English language skills.

learning_sources.name: EnglishClub
learning_sources.description: EnglishClub provides free resources for learning English, including grammar lessons, quizzes, and vocabulary.

learning_sources.name: ESL Gold
learning_sources.description: ESL Gold offers a variety of resources for learning English, including lessons, exercises, and podcasts.

learning_sources.name: British Council Learn English
learning_sources.description: The British Council offers a range of free online resources for learning English, including courses, games, and activities.

learning_sources.name: Duolingo

learning_sources.name: Memrise
learning_sources.description: Memrise provides a range of courses for learning Swedish, emphasizing vocabulary and phrases.

learning_sources.name: SwedishPod101
learning_sources.description: SwedishPod101 offers audio and video lessons for learning Swedish, along with cultural insights.

learning_sources.name: Babbel
learning_sources.description: Babbel provides structured lessons with a focus on conversation and real-life scenarios for learning Swedish.

learning_sources.name: Svenska Institutet
learning_sources.description: The Swedish Institute offers free courses for learning Swedish, including grammar and pronunciation lessons.

learning_sources.name: Folkuniversitetet
learning_sources.description: Folkuniversitetet offers both online and in-person Swedish courses at various levels.

learning_sources.name: The Local Sweden
learning_sources.description: The Local provides articles, news, and resources for learning Swedish and understanding Swedish culture.

learning_sources.name: Rivstart
